body: And this is where the phrase "busting a nut" comes from.

Fascinating story. During the civil war a soldier was shot in the testicle on the battlefield. The bullet exploded his nut and kept going, eventually hitting a young female nurse in the abdomen. Well, you guessed it. She got pregnant. What's so cool is that the soldier found out about her, tracked her down and married her.
Holy hell that's a lot of pages
